widget.name: ShowHideDivButton
widget.description: A button that shows or hides the nearest div with a given class.

property.caption: Context object
property.description: The context entity (required for the dynamic label)

property.caption: Dynamic Button Text
property.description: Overrides the static button text with something from an attribute. Choose a context entity!

property.caption: Event
property.description: Show/Hide the div on click or hover **Note in order to use hover, this widget must be directly touching (i.e. a sibling) of the target container.

property.caption: Target CSS Class
property.description: The CSS class of the div that should hide and show.

property.caption: Shared Parent CSS Class
property.description: The CSS class of a shared parent div. This is used to ensure we're showing/hiding the correct div if in a list.

property.caption: Toggle CSS Class
property.description: A class to add/remove from the button when clicking on it.

property.caption: Start hidden
property.description: Whether to start the target div hidden or shown.

property.caption: Show duration
property.description: Length of time (in ms) for the "show" animation.

property.caption: Hide duration
property.description: Length of time (in ms) for the "hide" animation.
